resources.string: Please log in to use this application properly.
Type a name of rss feed
How often to check new messages from channels?
Use signal to notify about new tweets
There was a problem with your url (maybe it is not a valid url)
There was a problem with parsing url.
You have to been logged in
You have successfully tweeted your message
Some error occurred. Check you twitter session, Internet connection or status is duplicate.
You have already followed this feed

In order to use this application login to your Twitter account. If you want to add new RSS channal, press + and type RSS URL address you want to follow. If you want to delete some channel, long click and press Delete option.


Just click an interesting RSS channel to see all associated messages with it. You can filter them changing period of time you are interested pressing Filter option.


If you want to tweet some message on your twitter account long click and select Tweet it!
